channel.title: [2006] Original Phonescape & DemolishScape Client
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]Info:[/b][/size] This is the original Phonescape source from 2006 untouched. I'm sure many of the older members will remember this server and dem good ol days. It's been on my HDD for a long time and I decided to re-release for any interested veterans. Have fun crying at seeing the code while reliving your youth in game. I don't think this is the original client phonescape used though, but it's compatible and probably from around that time as well. Damn time goes hella fast.
[size=14pt][b]Media:[/b][/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NQZh2Q4.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eJ3GIad.png[/img]
[size=14pt][b]Downloads:[/b][/size] Phonescape Source: http://up.ht/14t3HDT DemolishScape Client: http://up.ht/16VxxwY
[size=14pt][b]Credits:[/b][/size] Whoever made phonescape and demolishscape

item.title: [2006] Original Phonescape & DemolishScape Client
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[size=14pt]Info:[/size]
This is the original Phonescape source from 2006 untouched.
I’m sure many of the older members will remember this server and dem good ol days.
It’s been on my HDD for a long time and I decided to re-release for any interested veterans.
Have fun crying at seeing the code while reliving your youth in game.
I don’t think this is the original client phonescape used though, but it’s compatible and probably from around that time as well.
Damn time goes hella fast.
